description: The soft-toned decor is modern and intimate, while the cuisine also has a contemporary feel. Dishes include meat and fish options, plus numerous types of risottos, many of which feature distinctly modern ingredients. Coffee service and aperitifs in the near Laboratory, at n 10.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
